Articles.Content:
Well now that you are stuck in a closed infinity loop.  ∞ and can't get out.

I claim all the other hills going.

**MY FREE HILLDONIA.**

They discover a rare mineral and name it Hilldonium.

Hilldonium Hill

I take the hill since nobody claims it. Then i turn everything to the finnish kieli koska kyllä.

**MINUN KUKKULA.**

I'm taking it.

私のヒッル！！

Spoiler

Excuse my Japanese if it's wrong, I'm still learning. ![:grin:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/grin.png ":grin:")

**Edited <time datetime="2021-10-06T17:13:10Z" title="10/06/2021 05:13  PM" data-short="2 yr">October 6, 2021</time> by AtomicTech**
Otaku Hill

> 
> 
> 5 minutes ago, kerbiloid said:
> 
> 
> Otaku Hill
> 

![anime-shooting.gif](https://c.tenor.com/Yr5YFTmfxTgAAAAd/anime-shooting.gif)

My hill.

The original of this had "The audience is Otaku" at the beginning with the THX swell of sound. This is still one of my all time favoutites [@AtomicTech](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/210823-atomictech/)

<iframe allowfullscreen="" frameborder="0" height="113" width="200" data-embed-src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Lzra_Od50oI?feature=oembed"></iframe>

**MY DELERIOUSLY SILENT HILL**

All your hill are belong to them.

The Otaku Hills are under attack.

Spoiler

![evangelionbdcap6_original1.jpeg](https://ru.myanimeshelf.com/upload/dynamic/2012-07/03/evangelionbdcap6_original1.jpeg)

Attacku Hill

I make myself a goddess somehow and i say "all thour hill shalt be mine"

**MY HILL**

**Edited <time datetime="2021-10-07T15:39:49Z" title="10/07/2021 03:39  PM" data-short="2 yr">October 7, 2021</time> by Maria Sirona**
  
Forgot "

Rock and Roll becomes the new God and now

***MY HILLS ARE ALIVE WITH THE SOUND OF MUSIC.***

A firebreathing winged lunar bunny jumps to the hill and  dismisses false gods.

Mutant Bunny Hill

A on eyed, one horned, flying purple people eater, comes and eats the mutant bunny.

Sax on the hill, more on still.

"Sax on the hill!!!"

Spoiler

![King-Arthur-007.jpg?width=300&quality=45](https://i.guim.co.uk/img/static/sys-images/Film/Pix/pictures/2011/1/27/1296122041111/King-Arthur-007.jpg?width=300&quality=45&auto=format&fit=max&dpr=2&s=a1b5d0ce2920c090f93af6882e055a13)

Keira Hill

The Romans win and surround it with Hadrians Wall.

Roman Hill.

Spartacus & sidekicks rebel and capture the hills.

Spartacus Hill.

Then Maria Sirona comes in with a tank from the late 20th century and just takes the hill.

**MY HILL**

Then i drop a unprotected, unshielded nuclear reactor onto the hill. Everything is cooked by radiation and vaporised by the heat. After a few centuries, it is safe again and i charge up the hill. I protect it with 10000000000000000000000000 landmines, ocean mines (link land mines in the sea but idk what to call them) and air mines (wait what?).

then i sit back, play some ksp and wait.
Timewarp Hill
Kraken Hill
Cracked Hill
Cracked Kraken Hill

I ask everyone to leave

Spoiler

With a tank

my hill

Everyone leaves.

Left Hill

Well, there is no hill as a butterfly landed on 1 of [@Space Kerbalisation Tech](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/211297-space-kerbalisation-tech/)'s landmines and set off a chain reaction that vapourised the hill.

I shrink and claim a miniscule bump that is left as my hill.

***MY QUANTUM HILL.***

The hill was insured, so the hill landlord buys this area, and the former yours is now

Landlord Hill
